trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around January 2nd 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was late at night and I couldn't sleep and I decided to look out the window to see if I could see any UFOs. I'm not the wierdo with a tinfoil hat seeing UFOs in every cloud, but I know what I saw. I saw a sphere of light, bright gold, and I have a picture to prove it. The creature didn't show up on the picture, but the creature was tall, skinny, and pink. When I turned away to see what time it was after I took the picture, the UFO rocketed up into the sky. And that's pretty much it.
Summary: Sphere of light with creature stepping out
